name: AOD-9604
overview: A modified fragment of human growth hormone (amino acids 176-191) that was developed to retain the fat-reducing effects of HGH without the growth-promoting effects. Research has explored its potential for fat metabolism without affecting blood sugar or tissue growth.
who_should_avoid: individuals with metabolic disorders without clinician oversight
interactions_notes: Limited interaction data available. May affect fat metabolism. Discuss with clinician if taking diabetes medications, thyroid medications, or other weight management therapies.
dosing_ranges_literature: Clinical studies have explored doses ranging from 250-500 mcg administered once or twice daily, typically on an empty stomach in the morning and/or before exercise.
storage_notes: Store unreconstituted peptide in freezer (-20Â°C or colder). After reconstitution with bacteriostatic water, store refrigerated and use within 2-3 weeks.

references.title: AOD-9604 and adipose tissue metabolism
references.note: Early research on the lipolytic effects of the HGH fragment.

references.title: Clinical trials of AOD-9604 for obesity
references.note: Overview of clinical trial results for AOD-9604 in weight management.
